<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/cbscommon" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:cbscommon="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/cbscommon" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>common structure of header</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType name="SecurityInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="LoginSystemCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is request system code which is defined in CBS.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Password" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="RemoteIP" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OperatorInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="OperatorID" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The operator ID which is defined in both CBS system and request system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ChannelID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is channel ID which the operator belongs to</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OwnershipInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BEID" type="xs:integer"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The Business Entity ID which the customer belongs to</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BRID" type="xs:long" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The Business Region ID which the customer belongs to.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>message header</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType name="RequestHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Version ID of CBS interface</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BusinessCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Business operation code from request system (For example: function code in CRM system).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MessageSeq" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Unique sequence number for one message. If request system resend a message, this field should be unchanged. For example: CRM can use "OrderID + OrderNodeID" as this field.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OwnershipInfo" type="cbscommon:OwnershipInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="AccessSecurity" type="cbscommon:SecurityInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is for security authentication for request system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OperatorInfo" type="cbscommon:OperatorInfo" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It indicates the operator information of the request.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AccessMode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="MsgLanguageCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is used to specify the language of description in returen message.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TimeFormat" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="TimeType" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="TimeZoneID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AdditionalProperty" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Reserved for future extention</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Code" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation/> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ResultHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Version ID of CBS interface</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ResultCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>0: success Other values: failure code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MsgLanguageCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is used to specify the language of description in returen message.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ResultDesc" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The brief description of result code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="AdditionalProperty" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Reserved for future extention</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Code" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation/> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MessageSeq" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Unique sequence number for one message. If request system resend a message, this field should be unchanged. For example: CRM can use "OrderID + OrderNodeID" as this field.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:bccommon="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/bccommon"> <xs:import namespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/bccommon" schemaLocation="CBSInterface_BC_Common.xsd"/> <xs:complexType name="ManageExternalRoutingRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="OpType" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>[1]: Add a new external routing information [2]: Delete an external routing information [3]: Modify and external routing information</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SubIdentityType" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Subscriber identifier type. The options are as follows:  1: MSISDN (default value) The other values are reserved now:  2: IMSI  3: SIP_URI  4: NAI  5: VoIP SIM  9: Data MSISDN  10: Associated MSISDN  20: Fixed-Line Number  30: Account (URI Format)  40: IPTV Login Account (URI Format)  41: Cable TV (URI Format)  50: VoIP  51: VoIP Login Account (URI Format)  60: ICCID (Integrated Circuit Card Identifier)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SubIdentity" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Subscriber identifier. <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/uvcheader" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:uvcheader="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/uvcheader" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>common structure of header</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType name="SecurityInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="LoginSystemCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is request system code which is defined in CBS.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Password" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="RemoteIP" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OperatorInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="OperatorID" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The operator ID which is defined in both CBS system and request system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ChannelID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is channel ID which the operator belongs to</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OwnershipInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BEID" type="xs:int"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The Business Entity ID which the customer belongs to</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BRID" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The Business Region ID which the customer belongs to.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>message header</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType name="RequestHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Version ID of CBS interface</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BusinessCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Business operation code from request system (For example: function code in CRM system).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MessageSeq" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Unique sequence number for one message. If request system resend a message, this field should be unchanged. For example: CRM can use "OrderID + OrderNodeID" as this field.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OwnershipInfo" type="uvcheader:OwnershipInfo" minOccurs="0"/> <xs:element name="AccessSecurity" type="uvcheader:SecurityInfo"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is for security authentication for request system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OperatorInfo" type="uvcheader:OperatorInfo" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It indicates the operator information of the request.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MsgLanguageCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is used to specify the language of description in returen message.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TimeFormat" minOccurs="0"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="TimeType" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="TimeZoneID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ResultHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Version ID of CBS interface</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ResultCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>0: success Other values: failure code</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ResultDesc" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The brief description of result code.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

OCS provide special value according special interface)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Version ID,current version is 1(CRM is always 1)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TransactionId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Transaction ID,used to compound session, default null (CRM is always null)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SequenceId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Sequence ID,used to compound session,default 1(CRM is always 1)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*valid to compound session, default value is None, enumerate values as follows: Event, not compound session type Start, session begin Continue,session continue Stop, session stop. (CRM is always Event)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Event" id="Event"/> <xs:enumeration value="Start" id="Start"/> <xs:enumeration value="Continue" id="Continue"/> <xs:enumeration value="Stop" id="Stop"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SessionEntity" type="common:SessionEntityType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>for security use it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InterFrom" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>the source of interface: 4050000 for BSS 4050001 for Bank 4050002 for SP ...... it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InterMode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The mode of interface 4050000 for Face to Face 4050001 for Website 4050002 for IVR ...... it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InterMedi" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Interaction Media if Website then give URL if IVR then give access number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="visitArea" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>visit area Only IVR is useful it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="currentCell" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The current cell of calling Only IVR is useful it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="additionInfo" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>addition information it is optional if bank then bankcode if SP then Spcode</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ThirdPartyID" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>reserve parameter 1 it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Reserve2" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>reserve parameter 2 it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Reserve3" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>reserve parameter 3 it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PartnerID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Partner id,this parameter is used for fill the information of the partner when the session is generated by carrier it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OperatorID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>CRM system operator id it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PartnerOperID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>partner operaor id it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TenantID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ResultHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CommandId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="TransactionId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="SequenceId" </xs:schema>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/ocginterface/common" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:common="http://www.huawei.com/bme/ocginterface/common" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:complexType name="RequestHeader"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>for user information use(add,modify,delete)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CommandId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Message command ID. OCS provide special value according special interface)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Version ID,current version is 1(CRM is always 1)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TransactionId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Transaction ID,used to compound session, default null (CRM is always null)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SequenceId" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*Sequence ID,used to compound session,default 1(CRM is always 1)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="RequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>(*valid to compound session, default value is None, enumerate values as follows: Event, not compound session type Start, session begin Continue,session continue Stop, session stop. (CRM is always Event)*)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="Event" id="Event"/> <xs:enumeration value="Start" id="Start"/> <xs:enumeration value="Continue" id="Continue"/> <xs:enumeration value="Stop" id="Stop"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SessionEntity" type="common:SessionEntityType" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>for security use it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InterFrom" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>the source of interface: 4050000 for BSS 4050001 for Bank 4050002 for SP ...... it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InterMode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The mode of interface 4050000 for Face to Face 4050001 for Website 4050002 for IVR ...... it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="InterMedi" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Interaction Media if Website then give URL if IVR then give access number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="visitArea" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>visit area Only IVR is useful it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="currentCell" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The current cell of calling Only IVR is useful it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="additionInfo" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>addition information it is optional if bank then bankcode if SP then Spcode</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ThirdPartyID" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>reserve parameter 1 it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Reserve2" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>reserve parameter 2 it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Reserve3" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>reserve parameter 3 it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PartnerID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Partner id,this parameter is used for fill the information of the partner when the session is generated by carrier it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="OperatorID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>CRM system operator id it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TradePartnerID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>partner id,this parameter is used for fill the information of partner when the session is generated by partner it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PartnerOperID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>partner operaor id it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BelToAreaID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>belong to area it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="SerialNo" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>CRM system request serial number</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Remark" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The remark information about this operation, it is optional</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="TenantID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="ResultHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CommandId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="TransactionId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="SequenceId" con:part.con:content: <definitions targetNamespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/woservices" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:soapenc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:mime="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/mime/" xmlns:cbscommon="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/cbscommon" xmlns:wo="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/woservices"> <types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/woservices" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <import namespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/cbscommon" schemaLocation="CBSInterface_MessageHeader.xsd"/> <include schemaLocation="WorkOrder.xsd"/> <element name="WorkOrderRequestMsg"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="RequestHeader" type="cbscommon:RequestHeader"/> <xs:element name="WorkOrderRequest" type="wo:WorkOrderRequest"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </element> <element name="WorkOrderResultMsg"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ResultHeader" type="cbscommon:ResultHeader"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </element> </xs:schema> </types> <message name="WorkOrderRequestMessage"> <part name="WorkOrderRequestMsg" element="wo:WorkOrderRequestMsg"/> </message> <message name="WorkOrderResultMessage"> <part name="WorkOrderResultMsg" element="wo:WorkOrderResultMsg"/> </message> <portType name="WoServices"> <operation name="WorkOrder"> <input message="wo:WorkOrderRequestMessage"/> <output message="wo:WorkOrderResultMessage"/> </operation> </portType> <binding name="WoServicsBinding" type="wo:WoServices"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="WorkOrder"> <soap:operation soapAction="WorkOrder" style="document"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> <output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </output> </operation> </binding> <service name="WoServices"> <port name="WoServicesPort" binding="wo:WoServicsBinding"> <soap:address location="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/woservices/wsdl/WorkOrder_Services.wsdl"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/cbscommon" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" xmlns:cbscommon="http://www.huawei.com/bme/cbsinterface/cbscommon" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>common structure of header</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType name="SecurityInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="LoginSystemCode" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is request system code which is defined in CBS.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Password" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="RemoteIP" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OperatorInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="OperatorID" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The operator ID which is defined in both CBS system and request system.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="ChannelID" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>It is channel ID which the operator belongs to</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="OwnershipInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BEID" type="xs:integer"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The Business Entity ID which the customer belongs to</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BRID" type="xs:long" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The Business Region ID which the customer belongs to.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>message header</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexType name="RequestHeader"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="Version" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Version ID of CBS interface</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="BusinessCode" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Business operation code from request system (For example: function code in CRM system).</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="MessageSeq" type="xs:string"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Unique sequence number for one message.
